backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with types, storage, access control, and initial seeding logic for bikes, reviews, articles, comments, and related data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/.deploy-retry-trigger: Metadata file indicating a deployment retry attempt with timestamp and reason.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation outlining procedures for handling deployment failures and retry steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base variables, light/dark themes, and core styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component with about text, category links, region list, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component with navigation links, search bar, region selector, mobile menu, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps the app with RegionProvider and renders header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/BikeCard.tsx: Displays a bike card with image, region badge, specs, price, and navigation to the bike detail page.
frontend/src/components/BikeForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing bikes, managing images, color options, specs parsing, and uploads.
frontend/src/components/BikeImageGallery: Interactive image gallery with navigation arrows, thumbnails, error handling, and optional expand action.
frontend/src/components/BikeSelector.tsx: Popover-based searchable dropdown for selecting a bike from a list.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Grid of category cards linking to category pages or comparison page with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays and manages a comment list for a review, including posting, moderation, and loading states.
Renders a side‑by‑side comparison table of two bikes with specs and optional review score highlights.
frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Provides a modal image viewer with keyboard navigation, cycling, and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/LatestLaunchesCa: Shows recent launch articles in a looping carousel with titles, regions, and excerpts.
frontend/src/components/ModerationMenu.t: Dropdown menu allowing owners or admins to hide or delete a comment with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/PaletteSwatchEdi: Dialog for editing a palette swatch’s hex color with validation and live preview.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to set up their profile by submitting name and optional bio.
frontend/src/components/RatingWidget.tsx: Displays average rating and lets authenticated users submit a star rating for a review.
frontend/src/components/RegionFilter.tsx: Renders region selection tabs and notifies parent when the selected region changes.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthActio: Wraps an action and prompts users to sign in if they are not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ScoreBreakdown.t: Shows detailed score categories with progress bars and an overall score badge.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Exposes authentication state, user profile, and admin role based on Internet Identity and queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity management, login, logout, and status handling for Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating articles, reviews, and related backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionContext.tsx: Stores and persists the selected region in context and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, query client, and the identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays full article details, handling loading, missing state, and navigation back to its category.
frontend/src/pages/BikeDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed bike info, handles invalid IDs, loads images, and supports color-based image selection with a lightbox.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Shows all bikes for a specific brand, including brand logo, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/BrandsPage.tsx: Generates a searchable list of motorcycle brands grouped from all bikes, including logos and counts.
frontend/src/pages/BuyingGuideDetailPage: Loads and displays a specific buying guide article with metadata, checklist, and fallback for missing guides.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Lists articles or reviews for a category with region filtering, sorting, and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ComparePage.tsx: Allows selecting two bikes and displays a comparison table with specs and related reviews.
frontend/src/pages/CreateArticlePage.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to create or save an article with title, author, content, category, and region, then navigates to the article or drafts page.
frontend/src/pages/CreateReviewPage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to create or save a motorcycle review with ratings and bike selection, then redirects to the review or drafts page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays homepage content including trending reviews, latest launches, hero section, and category navigation using fetched articles, bikes, and reviews.
frontend/src/pages/ManageBikesPage.tsx: Enables authenticated users to create, edit, delete, and seed motorcycle listings, with dialogs and a bike form for management.
frontend/src/pages/MyDraftsPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users their draft articles and reviews, with options to publish or create new content.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full review with bike info, scores, comments, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Aggregates search results across articles, reviews, and bikes, with optional brand grouping.
frontend/src/pages/SectionPalettesPage.t: Lets users create text-based sections and generate or edit color palettes extracted from the text.
frontend/src/utils/markdownSpecs.ts: Parses Markdown spec tables to extract formatted specs text, price ranges, and color lists.
frontend/src/utils/sectionPalette.ts: Provides utilities to detect colors in text and generate palettes, including hex/name extraction and variants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, issues, and feature requests related to markdown price parsing and editable color palettes.
